name: Introduction
content:
Credit Fraud Detection


Overview:


Our Credit Fraud Detection solution employs sophisticated, data-driven techniques to swiftly identify unusual transactions, safeguarding our business from fraudulent activities. This enables Lander to make informed decisions, ensuring secure and profitable lending practices.


Data Description:


This dataset comprises customer transaction details, including transaction dates, credit card information, merchant details, and demographic data. The goal is to predict the likelihood of fraud (binary label: 1 for fraud, 0 for non-fraud) based on features like transaction amount, city population, and job.


Workflows:


Data Profiling: Explore the distribution, spread, and overall profile of raw data using different nodes. Acquire a comprehensive understanding of the data before proceeding.


Exploring Transactional Data: Investigate customer transaction data to identify the most impacted state by fraudulent transactions, discern the most targeted audience, and analyze trends in fraudulent transactions.


Data Preparation and Feature Engineering: Generate Transaction Frequency features and contribute to the creation of two essential datasets: 1) Training Datasets and 2) Prediction Datasets.


Model Training using H2O DRF: Utilize the H2O Distributed Random Forest model for effective model training.


Model Prediction Using H2O DRF: Apply a pre-trained H2O Distributed Random Forest model to make accurate predictions.


Predictive Analysis: Uncover data-driven insights from model predictions. 


Analytical Apps: Use the Interactive UI for driving business decisions.
